attributes.action: Restore a Royal Yacht to Her Majesty The Queen
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The decommissioning of the Royal Yacht Britannia, typical of the petty minded vindictiveness of this appallingly shortsighted government, has left Her Majesty and the Royal Family without a State Vessel that befits their needs and status.

The Royal Yacht was an emblem for Britain throughout the world and its absence detracts from the splendour of the British Monarchy and demeans us as a nation in the eyes of the world.

We implore the Prime Minister to remedy this failure by commissioning a new Royal Vessel, worthy of her Majesty and her successors.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
